languages.text: "За свои преступления ты отправишься на арену. Вкуси то, на что обрекал товарищей".
"For your crimes, I am sending you to the arena. You will suffer the fate to which you doomed so many others."
languages.original_text: "За свои преступления ты отправишься на арену. Вкуси то, на что обрекал товарищей".

traits.locale_text: "For your crimes, I am sending you to the arena. You will taste that to which you were consigning your own people."
"For your crimes, I am sending you to the arena. You will taste that to which you were consigning your own people."
"For your crimes, I am sending you to the arena. You will taste that to which you were consigning your own people."
"For your crimes, I am sending you to the arena. You will taste that to which you were consigning your own people."
"For your crimes, I am sending you to the arena. You will suffer the fate to which you doomed so many others."
"For your crimes, I am sending you to the arena. You will suffer the fate to which you doomed so many others."

languages.text: 「その罪により、お前を闘技場に送る。同胞を陥れようとした報いを受けるがいい」
languages.original_text: "For your crimes, I am sending you to the arena. You will suffer the fate to which you doomed so many others."

traits.locale_text: 「その罪により、お前を闘技場に送る。同胞を陥れようとした報いを受けるがいい」

languages.text: “你犯下了重罪，我要把你送上竞技场。你害死了那么多人，现在轮到你了。”
languages.original_text: "For your crimes, I am sending you to the arena. You will suffer the fate to which you doomed so many others."

traits.locale_text: “你犯下了重罪，我要把你送上竞技场。你会亲自感受你的人会怎么对付你。”

languages.text: «Por sus crímenes, irá a la arena. Compartirá el destino al que ha condenado a su gente».
languages.original_text: "For your crimes, I am sending you to the arena. You will suffer the fate to which you doomed so many others."

traits.locale_text: «Por tus crímenes, irás a la arena. Compartirás el destino al que has condenado a tu gente».

languages.text: "Ich schicke Euch für Eure Verbrechen in die Arena. Ihr werdet das Schicksal erleiden, zu dem Ihr so viele andere verdammt habt."
languages.original_text: "For your crimes, I am sending you to the arena. You will suffer the fate to which you doomed so many others."

traits.locale_text: "Ich schicke Euch für Eure Verbrechen in die Arena. Ihr werdet selbst von dem Leid kosten, zu dem Ihr Eure Leute verdammt habt."

languages.text: « En punition pour vos crimes, je vous envoie dans l'arène afin que vous connaissiez le sort que vous avez imposé à tant d'autres. »
languages.original_text: "For your crimes, I am sending you to the arena. You will suffer the fate to which you doomed so many others."

traits.locale_text: « En punition pour vos crimes, je vous envoie dans l'arène afin que vous vous rendiez compte de ce que vous faisiez subir à vos propres gens. »

languages.text: "İşlediğin suçlar nedeniyle seni arenaya gönderiyorum. Birçoklarını mahkûm ettiğin kadere mahkûm olacaksın."
languages.original_text: "For your crimes, I am sending you to the arena. You will suffer the fate to which you doomed so many others."

traits.locale_text: "İşlediğin suçlar nedeniyle seni arenaya gönderiyorum. Diğer pek çoğunu mahkûm ettiğin kadere kendin de mahkûm olacaksın."
